quotes.message: Let us give thanks for our shadows for they are there in the first place because of the presence of light.
quotes.name: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.message: Everywhere, even in the blackest abyss, he believed one might witness the divine. The shadows and contrast―absence itself―as important as the light and marble, for one cannot exist without the other.
quotes.name: Eowyn Ivey

quotes.message: Pain and pleasure are the yin and yang of love.
quotes.name: J. Earp

quotes.message: In this world, there is no absolute good, no absolute evil,' the man said. 'Good and evil are not fixed, stable entities but are continually trading places. A good may be transformed into an evil in the next second. And vice versa. Such was the way of the world that Dostoevksy depicted in The Brothers Karamazov. The most important thing is to maintain the balance between the constantly moving good and evil. If you lean too much in either direction, it becomes difficult to maintain actual morals. Indeed, balance itself is the good.
quotes.name: Haruki Murakami

quotes.message: Yin and Yang. Big and small. You and me.
quotes.name: Hilary Bader

quotes.message: Within each of us lies conflicting forces: yin and yang, light and dark, good and evil.
quotes.name: David Slack

quotes.message: There is energy all around us. The energy is both Yin and Yang, positive energy and negative energy.
quotes.name: Michael Dante DiMartino

quotes.message: Yin and Yang are the two opposites which control the universe and thus the human body.
quotes.name: George Lucas

quotes.message: Yin is moist, weak, feminine, Yang is strong, dry, masculine.
quotes.name: George Lucas

quotes.message: Nature is about balance.
quotes.name: Dean Georgaris

quotes.message: You know us. Chocolate and peanut butter, yin and yang, Tarzan and Jane. Okay, maybe not the pulling hair, jungle love of it all.
quotes.name: Jerry Siegel

quotes.message: You know, yin and yang represents harmony of opposites. Man, woman, dark, light.
quotes.name: Christopher Keyser

quotes.message: You've already met them, actually. Twee and La, your Moon and Ocean, have always circled each other in an eternal dance. They balance each other. Push and pull. Life and death. Good and evil. Yin and Yang.
quotes.name: Michael Dante DiMartino

quotes.message: I maintain nonetheless that yin-yang dualism can be overcome. With sufficient enlightenment we can give substance to any distinction: mind without body, north without south, pleasure without pain. Remember, enlightenment is a function of willpower, not of physical strength.
quotes.name: Bing Gordon

quotes.message: I am the Continental . I am the main thing . Whatever come for and after me is yin yang .
quotes.name: Prince Rogers Nelson

quotes.message: That's just the Yin and the Yang of it . It's got some words and a beat to it . So don't you ask me to stop wanting it . Don't ask me to stop needing it .
quotes.name: Adam Ant

quotes.message: Not black and white . Just open your eye . The yin and yang . When balance is ripe . The fruit is the same . No formaldehyde . You'll feel what it's like .
quotes.name: Deer Come Hear

quotes.message: Let go of who you are . Step into the light of love . The power of kindness . We are Yin and Yang . A battle which will last forever.
quotes.name: Cree High

quotes.message: The essence of yin and yang centers on the tension between two halves of a whole that are both divided and connected.
quotes.name: Sandra Eckard

quotes.message: The essence of yin and yang centers on the tension between two halves of a whole that are both divided and connected.
quotes.name: Angellia Moore

quotes.message: The Yin and Yang Theory is one of the main theories emphasizing Feng Shui.
quotes.name: Angellia Moore

quotes.message: According to the Theory of Yin and Yang, everything in the universe consists of two opposing forces, yet they are deeply connected at a common place called or balance.
quotes.name: Angellia Moore

quotes.message: The Yin cannot exist without the Yang. The Yang cannot exist without the Yin. They cannot exist in isolation.
quotes.name: Angellia Moore

quotes.message: The Yin and Yang have to coexist to bring balance, peace, and harmony or Feng Shui to your life.
quotes.name: Angellia Moore

quotes.message: When there is harmony, Yin balances the Yang and Yang balances the Yin.
quotes.name: Brendan Kelly

quotes.message: There was neither dark nor bright, neither yin nor yang. With yin and yang not as yin or yang, and further divided into the four season.
quotes.name: Chenyang Li

quotes.message: Heaven and earth are constant and there is one yin and one yang. Yang is heaven's virtue and Yin is heaven's use of punishments.
quotes.name: Robin Wang

quotes.message: Of the ways to achieve success, expanding and contracting in accordance with the Yin and the Yang is the most precious.
quotes.name: Zhong Guan

quotes.message: The immutable laws of the universe - no matter how complicated they may seem - collectively speaking, are the interaction and the relationship between the two polar energies, Yin and Yang.
quotes.name: Larry Sang

quotes.message: In Consistency, you can find Changes. And in Changes, there are always Consistencies.
quotes.name: Larry Sang

quotes.message: Behind the screen of Misfortune, there is the presence of Fortune. Whereas in Fortune, hidden Misfortunes await.
quotes.name: Larry Sang

quotes.message: In a Yang there is always a Yin. And in a Yin, there is always a Yang.
quotes.name: Larry Sang

quotes.message: The relationship between Yin and Yang is that of a partnership. The universe would be impossible without their interaction.
quotes.name: John B. Cobb

quotes.message: A change between the two polarities yin and yang indicates a transition from one condition into another.
quotes.name: Ansgar Thomas Roemer

quotes.message: Yin and Yang has been regarded by the Chinese as an important principle for harmonizing conflicting principles, and it can help harmonize people's minds when faced with what seem to be irreconcilable conflicts in their religious identity.
quotes.name: John B. Cobb

quotes.message: These ten thousand creatures cannot turn their backs to the shade without having the sun on their bellies, and it is on this blending of the breaths that their harmony depends.
quotes.name: Ray Billington

quotes.message: Perfection is the duality of light and darkness.
quotes.name: Ray Billington

quotes.message: Know the strength of man, but keep a woman's care.
quotes.name: Ray Billington

quotes.message: Countless words count less than the silent balance between yin and yang.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: All things carry yin and embrace yang. They reach harmony by blending with the vital breath.
quotes.name: Laozi

quotes.message: There's eternal opposition between yin and yang. No third party at all, but treason occurs sometimes.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: The dance between darkness and light will always remainâ€” the stars and the moon will always need the darkness to be seen, the darkness will just not be worth having without the moon and the stars.
quotes.name: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.message: The motion of yin and yang generates all things in nature.
quotes.name: Meh Jiuzhang & Guo Lei

quotes.message: Accept your dark side, understanding it will help you to move with the light. Knowing both sides of our souls, helps us all to move forward in life and to understand that, perfection doesn't exist.
quotes.name: Martin R. Lemieux

quotes.message: There is no life without death. That is the true meaning of yin and yang.
quotes.name: Lisa See

quotes.message: The yin & the yang are opposite forces. Yet, they exist together in the harmony of a perfect orb.
quotes.name: R.A. Wise

quotes.message: Yin and Yang are one vital force - the primordial aura.
quotes.name: Wang Yangming

quotes.message: It tales two to Tao.
quotes.name: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.message: For you are more than just a thought. You are my everything. You are my Yin as I am your Yang. Together we make the world go round.
quotes.name: Angelia Bailey
